\item[ABP] Arterial blood pressure.

\item[ANP] Atrial natriuretic peptide.

\item[ARDS] Acute respiratory distress syndrome.

\item[AUROC] Area under the receiver operating characteristic curve.

\item[CI] Compatibility interval, e.g 95%CI [19.3; 25.2]. For Bayesian estimates, it is a *credible interval*; for frequentist estimates, it is a *confidence interval*. In both cases it represents the interval of parameter values compatible of the observed data.

\item[CO] Cardiac output.

\item[CVP] Central venous pressure.

\item[ECG] Electrocardiogram.

\item[EEOT] End-expiratory occlusion test.

\item[GAM] Generalized additive model.

\item[GDT] Goal-directed hemodynamic therapy.

\item[HES] Hydroxyethyl-starch.

\item[HR] Heart rate. 

\item[ICU] Intensive care unit.

\item[IV] Intravenous.

\item[LVOT] Left ventricular outflow tract.

\item[MAP] Mean arterial pressure.

\item[MFC] Mini-fluid challenge.

\item[P\textsubscript{MSF}] Mean systemic filling pressure.

\item[PBW] Predicted body weight.

\item[PEEP] Positive end-expiratory pressure.

\item[PLR] Passive leg raise.

\item[PP] Pulse pressure.
\item[PPV] Pulse pressure variation.

\item[RA] Right atrium.

\item[ROC] Receiver operating characteristics.

\item[RR] Respiratory rate.

\item[RV] Right ventricle.

\item[SD] Standard deviation.

\item[SV] Stroke volume.

\item[SVI] Body weight indexed stroke volume.

\item[SVV] Stroke volume variation.

\item[TAPSE] Tricuspid annular plane systolic excursion.

\item[TD] Thermodilution.

\item[TIPS] Transjugular intrahepatic portosystemic shunt.

\item[V\textsubscript{T}] Tidal volume (generally in ml kg(PBW)^-1^).

\item[VTI] (Left ventricular outflow tract) velocity time integral.
